S

safeClaim(Class<? extends AbstractRoom>, String, Location) - Method in class me.desertfox.dgen.AbstractDungeon
Tries to claim a room on a given location if:
- The room wouldn't hit another room
- The start location is on the grid

To actually see the physical room you need to call AbstractRoom.placeDown()

ShardGenerator - Class in me.desertfox.dgen.shard
The ShardGenerator class manages the process of generating rooms
and other objects into a shard

If you made a new ShardGenerator subclass then don't forget to register it ShardGenerator.register(Class)
Otherwise it won't be accessible

Keep in mind every instance of your class will represent a shard
ShardGenerator(DungeonShard) - Constructor for class me.desertfox.dgen.shard.ShardGenerator
